Articles.Content: Hope you enjoy

OH MY GOOD LORD THIS IS A WORK OF ABSOLUTE BRILLIANCE!

THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR EVERYTHING YOU HAVE EVER DONE!

uncaps

Ah, good ol' Nassault. I've been a huge fan of your work since 'Jeb' got featured on the KSP weekly. This film is just gorgeous. Thank you so much for making your videos.

Is that little bit of music at the very end (10:26-10:45) deliberate? If not, you may want to consider trimming it with YouTube's editing service...

By the way, I would be happy to make music for one of your upcoming videos. I've been tremendously inspired by the works of BoC and the other songs that you've used in your music, and I'm currently in the midst of creating music for all of the planets in-game (check my signature). I could really make just about anything you wanted. Thanks for your consideration

-Upsilon
this made me speechless. oh, and good to see you, BG!
